attributes.action: Award a knighthood to Captain Tom Moore
attributes.additional_details: A 99 year old veteran raising 5 million for the NHS. Get him Knighted
attributes.background: Support the Veteran raising funds for the NHS. Give him some recognition.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
